TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit OperationDescriptionCollection extends System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription>

Docs.summary: Represents a collection that contains operation descriptions.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription> is used to describe the contract for a service, including the associated operations. The operations are accessed from the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ContractDescription.Operations%2A> property which returns the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescriptionCollection> for the contract.
Each contract operation has a corresponding <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> that describes aspects of the operation, such as whether the operation is one-way or request/reply. Each <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> in turn describes the messages that make up the operation using a collection of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.MessageDescription>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription Find(string name) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns an operation description with a specified name from the collection of operation descriptions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method returns the first occurrence of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> in the collection with the name specified. If you need to find all of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> objects in the collection use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescriptionCollection.FindAll%28System.String%29> method instead.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.ObjectModel.Collection`1<class System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription> FindAll(string name) cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a collection of all the operation descriptions from the collection that have the specified name.
Docs.returns: The of type that contains the operation descriptions with the specified name.

.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void InsertItem(int32 index, class System.ServiceModel.Description.OperationDescription item) cil managed

Docs.param: The zero-based index at which item should be inserted.
Docs.summary: Inserts an element into the operation description collection at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is provided for the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] system to do input validation and is not expected to be called by users.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method is provided for the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] system to do input validation and is not expected to be called by users.
